name: Frogknight Studios Presents - Cap
description:
Hello! We are Frogknight Studios and we present our game Cap!

Cap is a game about an apprentice pyromancer named Cap. While Cap is watching his master, Barnabus' tower, he accidentally knocks over a bookcase full of magic tomes. These tomes release a Demon named Nommer into the tower. Now Cap must reclaim all the missing books and seal Nommer away all before Barnabus returns!
